name: Eczema
description: Chronic inflammatory skin condition causing dry, itchy, and inflamed skin patches

name: Dry Skin
description: Reduced skin moisture and barrier dysfunction leading to rough, flaky skin

name: Hyperpigmentation
description: Excess melanin production causing dark patches or spots

name: Photosensitivity
description: Increased sensitivity to UV radiation leading to sunburns and damage

name: Acne
description: Inflammatory condition affecting sebaceous glands and hair follicles

name: Rosacea
description: Chronic inflammatory condition causing facial redness and bumps

name: Psoriasis
description: Autoimmune condition causing rapid skin cell turnover and inflammation

name: Photoaging
description: Premature aging due to UV exposure and environmental damage

name: Loss of Elasticity
description: Reduced skin firmness and elasticity due to collagen/elastin changes

name: Contact Dermatitis
description: Skin inflammation caused by contact with irritants or allergens

name: Product Sensitivity
description: Increased reactivity to skincare ingredients and products

name: Telangiectasia
description: Visible dilated blood vessels near skin surface
